When '''Axe of the Unyielding''' is fully upgraded, it has a powerful vorpal on-hit effect in melee ranged combat.

There're other vorpal options in game at your disposal, [[Ravager]], a halberd, and [[Silver Sword]], a two-handed sword which [[Planetar]] and [[Fallen Planetar]] from [[High-level class ability|HLAs]] also come equipped with.

== Axe of the Unyielding +3 ==

=== Location ===
[[Watcher's Keep]] fourth floor, loot from Rock, one of the two minotaurs guarding the vaults, along with Garock,
